long_description: Before, during or after, the Rise Vegan Protein Bar makes good workouts great. Its super clean formula delivers a big protein boost. Lemon Cashew bar provides a completely vegan snack that delivers 15g of protein with only 4 ingredients. Sunflower Cinnamon bar is completely vegan, and contains sunflowers and plant-based pea protein for great flavor and 15g of protein. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Before, during or after, the Rise Vegan Protein Bar makes good workouts great. Its super clean formula delivers a big protein boost.
